LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi10.label: Make Freezer Mochi x10
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi10.description: This process creates Mochi that can be stored for a long time. This is done by soaking the Mochi before freezing it; cold air is preferable when drying it out.
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi50.label: Make Freezer Mochi x50
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi50.description: This process creates Mochi that can be stored for a long time. This is done by soaking the Mochi before freezing it; cold air is preferable when drying it out.
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi100.label: Make Freezer Mochi x100
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi100.description: This process creates Mochi that can be stored for a long time. This is done by soaking the Mochi before freezing it; cold air is preferable when drying it out.
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi300.label: Make Freezer Mochi x300
LanguageData.Prep_FreezeMochi300.description: This process creates Mochi that can be stored for a long time. This is done by soaking the Mochi before freezing it; cold air is preferable when drying it out.

LanguageData.Prep_FermentedSoybeans50.description: 大豆を藁に包んで納豆を作る。未完成品だが1日待つと納豆ができる。
